fullplot: Summer vacation started, and Greg has his own way to enjoy it with video games. However, his father wants him to go outside and stop playing video games, and his mother has her own plans, including a reading club. In addition, Greg can't get along with his father. The only thing they have in common is the hatred for the Lil Cutie Comics. Things only get worse after the stay at the beachside cabin goes totally wrong. Will anything go right? At least there's Holly Hills.
plot: School's out. Summer vacation is on. However, Greg may not have the best summer vacation ever. What could go wrong?
title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days

tomatoes.consensus: Overly familiar and a bit too reliant on slapstick, the sitcom-like Dog Days fails to improve upon previous installments and will likely appeal to few outside its target audience.

writers: Jeff Kinney (based upon the book by)
